channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipped sofa, 27th September
item.description:
Flytipping

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dallin Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned trailer, 27th September
item.description:
There is an abandoned trailer at the end of Waltham Gardens. It has been here for years and is rotting and falling to pieces. Children have been playing on it and today I have seen one trip and fall over the connector. It is extremely dangerous and is taking up valuable parking in an area which is already over subscribed for parking. Please remove it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Keswick Drive, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Friends group vegetation ready for clearing, 27th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tetty Way, Plaistow, London

item.title: Large tree branch dumped, 27th September
item.description:
Large tree branch pulled off tree and now in road /in pavement. Outside number 70 Walterton Rd W9 3PH

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Walterton Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge tree with suckers growing too close to property, 27th September
item.description:
Alder tree with suckers that have sprouted too close to property (I have chopped the suckers down). Similar tree has caused issues to property next door and council had tree roots blocked with metal sheeting and pruned tree back. Investigation going on as to whether the roots have caused an issue to water supply pipe as there is leakage there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149, Hayes Lane, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting litter, 27th September
item.description:
This part of the common is covered in litter, some of which I reported months ago, and is still there, along with yet more. Kindly address this issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Philimore Close, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights are completely out on a long stretch of road. Very unsafe at night., 27th September

item.title: Rubbish dumped where bin removed, 27th September
item.description:
A public bin used to be at the bus stop outside 114 Greenwich High Road. Bin was removed by council, but litter is dumped on grass and surrounding areas. Please return bin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 157, Greenwich High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal coming of bays to swap a skip, 27th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Beechwood Road, Hornsey, London
